name: 3d-aspect
desc: Sets the 3D properties for 3D chart types.  Allows you to change the viewing angle, chart depth, zoom level, and 3D engine type.

attrs.name: angle
attrs.desc: Sets the view angle when using the isometric 3D engine.  Value can be between 0 and 90, with the default viewing angle being 45Â°.

attrs.name: depth
attrs.desc: Sets the Z depth for a 3D chart type displayed in either isometric or true 3D.

attrs.name: true3d
attrs.desc: Sets whether the chart uses a true 3D engine or an isometric view.  Disabling true3d forces an isometric view.

attrs.name: x-anglexAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the X rotation viewing angle for the true 3D view. Viewing angle may vary depending on the chart type.

attrs.name: y-angleyAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the Y rotation viewing angle for the true 3D view. Viewing angle may vary depending on the chart type.

attrs.name: z-anglezAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the Z rotation viewing angle for the true 3D view. Viewing angle may vary depending on the chart type.

attrs.name: zoom
attrs.desc: Sets the perspective zoom for the true 3D view.  The default zoom level is 1.0.  Note that a leading 0 is required before the decimal for values less than 1.0.
